Danke! Req: RAZBAM T-2 Buckeye for FSX
Is anyone else having this problem? After I takeoff I lose all controls, but on the ground I can still taxi, rotate, etc...

Hi Tijauna, are you still having problems? If so, check page 18 in the manual on the Fly-by-wire control system. You need to turn the SEC switch off (it's the back section on the left hand console). I turned off all 3 switches (they are all ON by default, contrary to the manual), and I can now control the aircraft in flight.
